message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is still too high. I'm willing to come down a bit to $15,000. I believe this product will be a valuable asset to you and this is a very reasonable price.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it. I am still unable to meet your previous price of $18,000. However, I am willing to increase my offer to $12,000. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
